Combat.name: Aim
Combat.description: This is how well you use crossbows.

Combat.name: Crushing
Combat.description: This is how well you use hammers, maces, staves, and even your own fists.

Combat.name: Focus
Combat.description: This is how well you maintain your concentration in battle. This will help you cast spells or perform combat arts while under attack.

Combat.name: Piercing
Combat.description: This is how well you use daggers and spears.

Spellcasting.name: Disruption
Spellcasting.description: This reduces your target's resistance to your Disruption spells.

Spellcasting.name: Ministration
Spellcasting.description: This is how well you use spells that heal and cure.

Spellcasting.name: Ordination
Spellcasting.description: This is how well you use spells that augment your friends and weaken your enemies.

Spellcasting.name: Subjugation
Spellcasting.description: This is how well you use spells to command pets and control monsters.

Avoidance.name: Defense
Avoidance.description: This is how well you avoid physical attacks.

Secondary Tradeskills.name: Adorning
Secondary Tradeskills.description: This allows you to create adornments from the component essences created by deconstructing regular items.

Secondary Tradeskills.name: Experimentation
Secondary Tradeskills.description: Allows you to improve handcrafted items with risky experiments.

Secondary Tradeskills.name: Tinkering
Secondary Tradeskills.description: This allows you to make Gadgets, Gizmos, and Doohickeys

Harvesting.name: Mining
Harvesting.description: This is how well you mine for ore and minerals.

Harvesting.name: Transmuting
Harvesting.description: This allows you to deconstruct used or unwanted items into their base essences, which can then be used by a transmuter to create adornments.

Harvesting.name: Trapping
Harvesting.description: This is how well you catch small game animals.

General.name: Alcohol Tolerance
General.description: This is how well you tolerate the effects of alcohol.

General.name: Swimming
General.description: This is how well you swim in water.
